page.title: 20Credits.Canongate & Lawhead
page.content: The Land Cover Survey, Amenities Counts and Writing for this 4km by 3km block were undertaken by groups of senior pupils in two of the primary schools in St. Andrews,{Canongate {Primary School}and{Lawhead Primary {School.}The work was supervised by the Primary 6 and Primary 7 class teaching staff of both schools. The photographic work was carried out by Mr.G.Smith, visiting art teacher at Canongate and Mr. R.J.Shaw, Headteacher at Canongate. The items of text, contributed by the children, were assembled, edited, written up and finally checked by Mr. R.J.Shaw, Headteacher at Canongate.
